monotropa O

favillea B-Plant
is O
a O

of O

within O
the O
sclerodermataceae B-Plant
family O
. O

the O
gomphidiaceae B-Plant
are O
a O
family O
of O
mushroom O
- O
forming O
fungi B-Plant
in O
the O
order O
boletales O
. O

unlike O

, O

( O

for O

, O
having O
gills O
instead O

. O

member O
genera O
include O

, O

, O
gomphidius O
and O

being O

( O

with O

single O

may O

after O
molecular O
assessment O
. O

the O
similarly O

genus O

is O
unrelated O
to O
this O
family O
. O

another O
genus O
brauniellula O
has O
since O
been O
sunk O
into O
chroogomphus O
. O

like O
all O
agarics B-Plant
, O
this O
group O
was O
formerly O
classified O
in O
agaricales O
. O

nonetheless O
, O
many O
of O

features O
of O

fungi B-Plant
, O
such O
as O
spore O

strongly O
suggested O
an O

with O

. O

this O
was O
later O
confirmed O
through O
molecular O

, O

are O

to O

molecular O

have O
also O
demonstrated O

are O
nested O
well O
within O
boletales O
, O
being O
more O
closely O

to O
suillaceae B-Plant
than O
to O

, O

is O

of O
